profileAlternative.name: Shruti Ranjalkar
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Amazon (Alexa AI)
profileAlternative.summary:
Currently working as a Data Scientist in Amazon (Alexa AI).

I am passionate about problem-solving, statistical modeling, machine learning, deep learning techniques and keen to learn new technologies. I aim to leverage my experience and skills to deliver efficient and effective solutions.

Skill Set:
•ML Techniques: Decision Tree, Random Forest, Support Vector Machine, Regression,Naïve Bayes and Bayesian Nets,Gradient Boosting, Neural Nets,Text Analytics, K-nearest Neighbors

•Programming and Analytics Tools: R, Python, SQL, Excel, Tableau, TIBCO Spotfire, OBIEE, Microsoft Azure , Talend, SSIS
